entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Divinity: Original Sin 2
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö49,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 9,99¬†‚Ç¨ [9,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 49,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Divinity: Original Sin 2 j√° conta com mais de 160 pr√©mios e nomea√ß√µes, incluindo um BAFTA, e chega agora ao Mac. Forma um grupo e desfruta da jogabilidade ramificada com hist√≥rias distintas para cada personagem num mundo abandonado pelos deuses e entregue ao mal. As tuas decis√µes s√£o importantes, por isso, pondera as tuas op√ß√µes e lembra-te que apenas um poder√° tornar-se o Divine! Aviso: antes de comprar, verifica se o teu computador cumpre os requisitos listados em baixo. Carater√≠sticas: - Joga como uma das 5 ra√ßas de fantasia, cada uma com as suas pr√≥prias personalidades e hist√≥rias: Elfos, An√µes, Lagartos, Humanos e Mortos-vivos. - Explora um mundo vasto e cheio de saque, tesouros, melhorias e hist√≥rias com narrativas ramificadas nunca antes vistas. - Combate por turnos que inclui os elementos da natureza: combina fogo, terra, √°gua, ar e muito mais para derrotar os teus inimigos. - Fala com animais e fantasmas para ganhar informa√ß√µes √∫nicas sobre o mundo e os seus segredos. - Para at√© 4 jogadores online ou 2 jogadores em ecr√£ dividido no modo cooperativo. - Mant√©m CMD pressionado ao abrir o jogo para aceder √†s op√ß√µes de idioma e configura√ß√£o. Requisitos: seleciona ‚ÄúSobre Este Mac‚Äù a partir do menu Apple na tua barra de menus para verificar o modelo do teu Mac. SO: - recomendado macOS 10.14.2 Mojave (ou superior) - macOS 10.13.6 High Sierra suportado Hardware suportado: - MacBook Pro: todos desde o final de 2016 - MacBook Air: todos desde meados de 2017 - iMac: todos desde o final de 2014 com placa gr√°fica Radeon e todos os iMacs desde meados de 2017 - Mac Pro: todos desde 2019 - Mac mini: todos desde 2018 - eGPU: todos os m√≥dulos oficiais eGPU baseados em GPUs AMD Requisitos HDR: - macOS 10.14.2 ou superior - Qualquer iMac capaz de exibi√ß√£o de 500 Nits que suporte o Ajuste Autom√°tico do Brilho.

entry.title: Raiders Map
entry.content:
Discount Information

Compras integradas

  • Raider Mk. 1Ôºö5,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 0,99¬†‚Ç¨ [0,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 5,99¬†‚Ç¨]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöGratuito

Compras integradas

  • Raider Mk. 2Ôºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • Raider Mk. 3Ôºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • Raider Mk. 1Ôºö0,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • Raider WeeklyÔºö1,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

All in one app for an Interactive Map, Loot locations, Material list and breakdown list, Enemy drop list, guides and quest-line guides. - Interactive Maps - Sort and Filter - Event Timers and Notifications - Guides for Quests Guides and Maps are partially available for free, but a Pro membership is required to access all content Raiders Map is the best tool for easy access to everything, along with world class support. You can reach me directly on X for help or to report any issues: All4nDev, or through discord. Not affiliated with embark. Raiders Map is independently owned and managed. apple standard EULA https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
